sprache.bad_up: Either the user does not exist or the password is wrong.
sprache.banned: Too many bad login attemps. Please request a new password or contact us.
sprache.heading: User login
sprache.multipleHelper: Multiple users could be found connected to the login for %sp%. Please pick one.
sprache.multipleHelperEndpoint: Usually you will have to register an app at the service provider. During registration you will be provided with a key and access token. Both need to be entered at Easy-Wi. At the app you need to configure an endpoint. The endpoint for Easy-Wi is %url%
sprache.nouser: There is no user with the name or e-mail address you have entered.
sprache.send: An e-mail with activation token has been sent to you in case an e-mail account exists.
sprache.sus: Your account is suspended. Please contact us.
